dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
foodqapp
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
foodqapp
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
LaunchScreen
Main
foodqapp.auth
foodqapp needs access to your camera to take photos of food items and scan QR codes for pickup verification.
foodqapp needs access to your photo library to select photos of food items for your business profile.
foodqapp needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
foodqapp needs your location to show nearby restaurant deals and calculate distances to help you find the best food offers in your area.
foodqapp needs your location to show nearby restaurant deals and send you notifications about new deals in your area.
foodqapp needs your location to send you notifications about new deals when you're near participating restaurants.
foodqapp needs access to your microphone to record voice messages for customer support.
foodqapp sends notifications about order updates, new deals, and special offers from your favorite restaurants.
foodqapp needs access to your contacts to help you share deals with friends.
foodqapp uses motion data to provide better location accuracy when finding nearby deals.
